ratings.comment: Knows her stuff, but she has a super cold personality. Take good notes and rely on your TA. Exams aren't too bad, and she doesn't try to trick you

Dr. Batterton was the WORST prof i have ever had.  She's rude and expects her students to understand the material to their fullest potential, despite the fact that she may not even go over some topics.  Her exams were very hard and she was very unapproachable.

She tells you to study off of the old exams that are posted online, but when you take the exam you realize her old exams are much easier. She said she expects more of her students each semester. Also, she will try to trick you on exams. Her last midterm was too long and hard, even my TA said so. And her final was absolutely ridiculous.

She tells us to study off of the old exams that are posted online, but when you take the exam you realize her old exams are much easier. She said she expects more of her students each semester. Also, she will try to trick you on exams. Her last midterm was too long and hard, even my TA said so. And her final was absolutely ridiculous.

WARNING At first I thought she was an average professor, then I went to her office hours. She is the most unapproachable lecturer I have had in my 4 yrs. She's cold & not willing to listen. She's not reasonable, she's not nice, she does not care about you. At all. Period. Also, if she ever has any chance to ruin your life, she will do it. No doubt.
Avoid her if you can unless your girlfriend forces you to take it. She thinks that students must know everything....

Prof. Batterton is very intelligent and you can tell she knows what she's doing.  However, she's boring and acts like she doesn't want to be teaching.  She assumes the students can easily grasp all the concepts, and know more than they've been taught in 103.  She puts questions in her tests about things that might have been mentioned once.

Dr. Batterton is a great professor!!! If you attend every lecture and copy notes from the blackboard, you will be fine. She lists all of the materials for you so you don't need to waste time reading textbook after class. Also the exams are reasonable. I took 09 spring chem 104 and appreciate her so much.

Super easy class compared to other chem courses I've taken (I took summer session). Tests are easy but she really doesn't teach anything that the book doesn't cover. She's a clear lecturer, but her lectures are completely useless. Great for people who aren't good with chemistry; if you love chem find a different professor.

Dr. Batterton is clear & consise in her lectures. She outlines the text for you and covers the pertinent items. Go to lecture and you're golden. I took the summer term which goes fast, especially during lecture, but she welcomed questions if she had time. New & tough to begin, but a great prof overall. Get Jose Laboy for your TA & you'll be fine!!

extremely clear in her lectures- if you go to them you don't need to read the book. VERY reasonable exams- she definitely tries to teach you basic chemistry rather than throw in tricky problems. great professor for both those who love chemistry (you will understand every word) and those who struggle (extremely approachable/helpful/clear).

Batterton's tests are about 5 times harder than any other professors, she writes test questions to trick you, not to test your knowledge of the material.  She also puts a bell curve on the class, only chem 104 professor who does.  If you need to take this class take it with a different professor or prepare to have a rough, frustrating semester.

Jeannie B!  She is quite the cutie--On top of that her class is very easy. Chem 104 is a joke if you took chem AP in high school don't even bother studying because it is just a review.  If you took Chem 103 then you might learn SOME things but you can still get away with skipping lectures and reading the book the night before the exam.  Easy A here

She is extremely helpful! I didn't do so well on my first exam, but after I started going to her office hours, she helped me a lot and I was able to pull off an A. I would recommend her to anyone who has to take 104, her lectures are helpful and well organized, and she is always willing to help you if you go to office hours. Take Dr. Batterton!
